'''0.2.6_02''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released with client version [[Java Edition Alpha v1.2.4 01|v1.2.4_01]] on November 30, 2010.<ref>{{tumblr|notch|2050336602|Bug Update #3.|November 30, 2010|archive=1}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Creepers are no longer the only mob that spawns.
